author: rivals.com
title: THE WEST ZONE message board | SHOP NOW: DEALS on CLEMSON app
text:
Hillsborough (N.C.) Orange linebacker Payton Wilson already made two visits to Clemson before his recruitment exploded to the next level.
The latter will lead to his third trip to campus.
Having picked up an offer from the Tigers earlier this month, Wilson will make his way to the programâ€™s junior day March 4
